result.eng: Have you noticed that she is gone?
result.ga: Ar thug tú faoi deara go bhfuil sí imithe
result.orig: Ar thug tú faoi deara go bhfuil sí imithe
result.html: Ar thug tú faoi deara go bhfuil sí imitheHave you noticed that she is gone?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṫug tú faoi deara go ḃfuil sí imiṫeHave you noticed that she is gone?

result.ga: Thug mé an botún faoi deara
result.orig: Thug mé an botún faoi deara
result.html: Thug mé an botún faoi dearaI noticed the mistake.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé an botún faoi dearaI noticed the mistake.

result.eng: It's not just the weather's fault.
result.ga: Ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara é
result.orig: Ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara é
result.html: Ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara éIt's not just the weather's fault.
result.ponchtml: Ní hí an aimsir aṁáin faoi deara éIt's not just the weather's fault.

result.eng: The biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ga: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.orig: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.html: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ponchtml: An rud is mó atá le taḃairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná ċoṁ hamaitéaraċ is a ḃí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.

result.eng: In 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.
result.ga: I 2000 thosaigh sé ag foghlaim eitilte i bhFlorida in éindí le Marbhan Al-Seithí agus Siad Deara
result.orig: I 2000 thosaigh sé ag foghlaim eitilte i bhFlorida in éindí le Marbhan Al-Seithí agus Siad Deara
result.html: I 2000 thosaigh sé ag foghlaim eitilte i bhFlorida in éindí le Marbhan Al-Seithí agus Siad DearaIn 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.
result.ponchtml: I 2000 ṫosaiġ sé ag foġlaim eitilte i ḃFlorida in éindí le Marḃan Al-Seiṫí agus Siad DearaIn 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.
